subtitle: Cod fried in breadcrumbs served with home made chips.

method.text: Bone the fish. Wash in the lemon juice and water. Pat dry each fillet with kitchen paper. Sprinkle with salt. Set aside.
In a shallow bowl, mix the breadcrumbs and garlic powder together. Beat the egg white in a separate grease-free bowl until just fluffy, but not stiff.
Dip the fish first into the egg white and then into the breadcrumbs, ensuring the fish is well coated.
Heat the oil to 190°C. Deep fry the fish for 4-6 min until golden brown and cooked thoroughly. Drain on crumpled kitchen paper. Keep warm while frying the remaining fillets.
Pat dry the potatoes with kitchen paper. Fry for 10 min until golden brown.

title: Fish and chips
